## LiveSelector.replace() method

Replace the whole array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replace<NextType>(f: (arr: T[]) => NextType[]): LiveSelector<NextType>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  f | <code>(arr: T[]) =&gt; NextType[]</code> | returns new array. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`LiveSelector<NextType>`

## Example


```ts
ls.replace(x => lodash.dropRight(x, 2))

```
